comments:
The following NPE was in my console log several times while using last week's 1.5.1 build. I was using a web services wizard at the time, which creates a new project and adds it to an existing server. The error appears to occur while trying to refresh the Servers view.

Tim, did you experience any loss of function?  Were you using binary components at all?  If there is no loss of function I think this is a 1.5.2 defect.
Didn't notice anything wrong, just several of these stacks on every run I did. I had no binary modules in my workspace.

mass update to remove target for all those targeted to 1.5.3 that were "normal" severity and "priority 3" (on the surface those dont' seem serious enough to fix in a maintenance release). 

If I have made an error pleasae reset target and set priority appropriately.

Created an attachment (id=70893)
Patch for VirtualResource

hey Chuck - here's a patch that at least makes VirtualResource.getReadOnlyComponent() tolerant of a null return from StructureEdit.getStructureEditForRead(getProject()) (which can return null) - I think at least this level of fix should go into 1.5.5 and 2.0.1
